website_summaries.verdict: It might take fancy photos, but the Huawei P9's high price means it's not a good choice over the similarly priced Samsung Galaxy S7.
pros: The dual-lens camera takes great photos, particularly in black and white, and the phone's slim design makes it easy to carry around
cons: Huawei's Android skin is awkward to use and loaded with bloatware
The screen resolution should be higher, given the price

customer_reviews.title: Phone is for Australia, not optimal US
customer_reviews.text: It says International but at least in the US, signal strength is extremely weak. I miss 80% of my calls and conversation quality is terrible with lots of dropped calls. I contacted Huawei, they said that based on the phone's IMEI number, the phone is for Australia.
customer_reviews.author: 1MOTOSHOP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, excellent quality of materials
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, excellent quality of materials, works without problems especially with the upgrade to Nougat and EMUI 5. Thanks Huawei, keep making the products with the same or better quality at very reasonable prices as you have been doing.
customer_reviews.author: GDR

customer_reviews.title: The photos that i have taken so far have come out great. Performance is fast with no hiccups or stutters
customer_reviews.text: For the money and my intended usage(internet text videos and photos), this phone cannot be beat. While the UI does take some getting used to, there are enough articles on the web to help you set up your phone to suit your needs. The photos that i have taken so far have come out great. Performance is fast with no hiccups or stutters. Battery life is also good.
customer_reviews.author: nikolaos p.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the product arrived correctly but after a month the screen began to fail.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful phone
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It is amazing. Special the camera, it has many useful tool. Front camera make your face automatically looking smooth and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Yufei L.

customer_reviews.title: good phone, god price
customer_reviews.text: the phone is great. rear and front cameras are great battery lasts more than a day charging fast several notes: 1. if you are planning to use it as dual sim, you will have to weige the memory card slot for it. 2. make sure you buy the rapid charge charger and cables 3. the eva-l09 supports more bands (validate complience with your region before you buy)
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: A great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! I like it very much, especially the camera and finger print unlocking feature. The camera takes great pictures. It has some features which only SLR cameras have, such as shutter speed, ISO, and etc. The phone works fine, usually is fast. I don't need to reboot the phone. No heat problem. The only expectation didn't meet is that AT&T LTE doesn't work on my phone even though the phones bands include AT&T bands. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wenhui Dai

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. after four weeks usage
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. after four weeks usage, installed a few apps, it still runs great. so i write a review and give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: zi

customer_reviews.title: Super recommended for those who go on holiday in USA ...
customer_reviews.text: Super recommended for those who go on holiday in USA and need to make purchases from Argentina. The cell arrived earlier than planned and the seller answered all my questions quickly! On the other hand, this version of cell phone works perfectly in Argentina!! (EVA-L09)
customer_reviews.author: Facundo

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Fast
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Fast, touchscreen response is quick. Love the finger print scan on the back. Good photo quality. Right size, even good for one hand to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who needs an iPhone anymore?
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, I don't understand why it isn't more popular.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! It serves all my purposes for a cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: PoplarLeaf

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Best feature so far is the battery. The sound is excellent and it's ultrathin but solid. Very happy with the P9!
customer_reviews.author: The manufacturer refunded payment totally, so I cancel my previous negative qualification

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera phone but that's about it.
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing for this phone is the camera, other than that, i would not recommend buying this phone. There is no OTA software update, at least from my end, when I ask customer support for assistance, they keep redirecting me to different regions. I've been transferred from NA to North America to Singapore to Europe and back to NA. The only available updates are the ones you need to download third party applications to install. Even then, it's not guaranteed to work. Not to mention the HiSuite that come's with it "reinstalls" certain application to the ones from China.
customer_reviews.author: x140

product_meta.title: Huawei P9 (32GB) GSM Unlocked Smartphone w/ 5.2" Brilliant IPS-NEO LCD Display & Leica Dual-Lenses 12MP Camera - Titanium Grey
product_meta.description: Blending superior hardware and software with Leica dual lenses, the HUAWEI P9 enables you to capture high quality pictures without compromising on the handset’s sleek and compact style. Capture more light with two sensors, one RGB and one monochrome. Get incredible shots with the HUAWEI P9’s merging algorithm, which intelligently combines the colours taken by the RGB sensor with the detail of the monochrome sensor.
feature_bullets: This Smartphone is compatible worldwide with any GSM carrier (such as AT&T and T-Mobile in the U.S.) but will not work with CDMA carriers such as Verizon Wireless, Sprint, or US Cellular.
HUAWEI and Leica combine to create a stunning dual-lens camera in a smartphone. More light and better clarity, for amazing photos and videos.
Capture sharp images with built-in dual-core ISP, professional DSP, and the depth measurement ISP for improved image focusing, speeds, processing.
More vivid world that’s even closer to natural colours on a stunning 5.2" FHD display with 96% colour saturation and high contrast.
Stay charged for longer with the HUAWEI P9’s 3000 mAh (typical) battery.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars30 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
